original_text: Then Caleb stood in front of Moses and he told the Israelites to be quiet. He said, ‘We should go into the land and get power over it. We will certainly be able to do it!’
korean_text: 갈렙이 모세 앞에서 백성을 조용하게 하고 이르되 우리가 곧 올라가서 그 땅을 취하자 능히 이기리라 하나

sentences.original_text: Then Caleb stood in front of Moses
and he told the Israelites to be quiet
We should go into the land
We will certainly be able to do it
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 반드시 그것을 할 수 있을 것입니다
